intro: Lionfish are hiding a surprising secret. They're delicious! They are easily one of the tastiest fish in the ocean. Inside you'll find an incredible white, flaky fillet with a surprising amount of meat. Their fillets tend to render themselves well to any recipe normally used for white fish, such as snapper, grouper, hogfish, corvina, snook, etc. Don't believe me? Try it yourself! Petition your local restaurants to start serving it or head to the catch and map pages to bag some yourself. Don't know any recipes? Check some of these out below! They've been gathered from all over the internet.
